testCases.label: Test combining two small, sequential arrays
testCases.description: Verifies that combining the arrays {0, 1, 2} and {3, 4, 5} produces the expected concatenated array {0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5}.

testCases.label: Test combining two non-sequential arrays
testCases.description: Verifies that combining the arrays {9, 3, 5} and {4, 0, 1} produces the expected concatenated array {9, 3, 5, 4, 0, 1}, maintaining the element order.
